title: The Frog prince (Muppets)
creator_credit: Jim Henson, Robert Lawrence Productions and Henson Associates
brief_description: Sir Robin, the bravest prince is turned into a frog by an ogre. The only cure to revert him to his human form is to receive a kiss from a Princess, to lift the spell. Starring Trudy Young as the Princess and Gordon Thomson as the Prince, as well as the muppet performers.
